thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: alan knowles
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by alan knowles

author: alan knowles
title: alan knowles
text: Only sent 1 of 2 items, said the other was out of stock but when I checked it was instock. Requested them to send it reply said would have to reorder it ( gone up by £2 ) and pay £2.50 postage again. Despite ordering lot in past not use again, poor customer service.
